content: Amazing phone. Never used an Alcatel branded phone so quite happy with this one. Specs are amazing. Camera, sound quality, ease of use, everything is great. Only wish the in built memory was more. Delivery of product was late. Had to call daraz constantly to find out status of delivery. Eventually got it 3 days after cause weekend was there.
title: Alcatel 3 Smartphone 5.9  - 3GB RAM - 32GB ROM

content: The product came in due time. The phone is really nice, camera quality is very good and there are many advanced features like slow mo, time lapse. I wish the earphone was of a better quality. Otherwise the phone is really good. I am very happy with it.
title: Alcatel 3 Smartphone 5.9  - 3GB RAM - 32GB ROM

content: This phone was really awesome. slim and very light weight. display is ok and overall it's truly a budget killer. about camera I think it will meet your expectations. comes up with a silicon back cover, warranty card, a useless screen protector and a black head phone. thanks Daraz for bringing such a lovely product and really greatful for a really fast home delivery.
title: Alcatel 3 Smartphone 5.9  - 3GB RAM - 32GB ROM
